## Task 1

Read @Wilkinson:1999's guidelines for reporting statistical analyses.

Next, look at one of the experiments conducted in @vanStekelenburg:2021. Cross-check with the guidelines and formulate criticism (positive or negative) in relation with the reporting done by the authors.


## Task 2


Read @Nosek:2018preregistration and reflect on preregistration: is it common in your field? List benefits of preregistration and discuss how you view the topic. 

We will organize a discussion in the near future in class on the [replication crisis](https://lbelzile.github.io/math80667a/replication-crisis.html).
